text: Fencing at the 1974 Asian Games was held in Tehran, Iran between 3 and 13 September 1974. ==Medalists== ===Men=== {| |- |Individual épée | | | |- |Team épée | Pirouz Adamiat Sarkis Assadourian Ali Asghar Pashapour Esfandiar Zarnegar Behzad Zolfaghari |valign=top| Mitsuyasu Aida Makoto Ishikawa |valign=top| Gao Weilin Guo Yineng Tao Jinhan Tong Wei |- |Individual foil | | | |- |Team foil |valign=top| Masaya Fukuda Toshio Jingu | Kim Doo-kyung Kim Jung-il Kim Kuk-hyun Shin Dong-seok Sung Ki-man | Ahmad Akbari Parviz Almasi Sarkis Assadourian Ali Asghar Pashapour Kioumars Tolouei |- |Individual sabre | | | |- |Team sabre | Ahmad Akbari Ahmad Eskandarpour Abdolhamid Fathi Esmaeil Pashapour Manouchehr Shafaei |valign=top| Atsushi Akiho Masaya Fukuda Hideaki Kamei Hiroshi Nakajima |valign=top| Liu Mao Shen Changjie Wang Pinzhang Zhang Baoren |} ===Women=== {| |- |Individual foil | | | |- |Team foil | Maryam Achak Jila Almasi Giti Mohebban Mahvash Shafaei Maryam Shariatzadeh |valign=top| Yukari Kajihara Hiroko Kamada |valign=top| Nurit Carmi Nili Drori Inbar Guy Orli Schreiber |} ==Medal table== ==Participating nations== * * * * * * * * == References == * New Straits Times, September 7–16, 1974 * The Straits Times, September 7–16, 1974 ==External links== *Asian Games medalists Category:1974 Asian Games events 1974 Asian Games
title: Fencing at the 1974 Asian Games
